fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 155.31 lakh crore compared with Rs 124.31 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 99.60 points or 0.56% to settle at 17,844.60. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 2.27% to 13.38. HDFC Bank, Adani Enterprises and Kotak Mahindra Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The February 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 23 February 2023.
